com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class BarcodeScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.BarcodeScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActivityResultListener, Component

    public class BarcodeScanner
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements ActivityResultListener, Component
    Component for scanning a barcode and getting back the resulting string.
    Author:
    sharon@google.com (Sharon Perl)

    • Method Detail

      • Result

        public java.lang.String Result()
        Result property getter method.

      • DoScan

        public void DoScan()
        Begins a barcode scan, using the camera. When the scan is complete, the AfterScan event will be raised.

      • resultReturned

        public void resultReturned(int requestCode,
                           int resultCode,
                           Intent data)
        Description copied from interface: ActivityResultListener
        The callback method used to report Activity results back to the caller.
        Specified by:
        resultReturned in interface ActivityResultListener
        Parameters:
        requestCode - the originally passed in request code. Used to identify the call.
        resultCode - the returned result code: android.app.Activity#RESULT_OK or android.app.Activity#RESULT_CANCELED
        data - the returned data, encapsulated as an Intent.

      • AfterScan

        public void AfterScan(java.lang.String result)
        Indicates that the scanner has read a (text) result and provides the result

      • UseExternalScanner

        public boolean UseExternalScanner()
        Gets whether or not you want to use an external scanning program to scan barcodes.
        Returns:
        'true' or 'false' depending on whether or not you want to use an external scanning program.

      • UseExternalScanner

        public void UseExternalScanner(boolean useExternalScanner)
        Set whether or not you wish to use an External Scanning program such as Bar Code Scanner. If false a version of ZXing integrated into App Inventor Will be used.
        Parameters:
        useExternalScanner - Set true to use an external scanning program, false to use internal copy of ZXing.
